thread.title: Internet erupts with memes when Donald Trump sits in 18-wheeler
thread.title_full: Internet erupts with memes when Donald Trump sits in 18-wheeler

author: BRETT BODNER
title: Internet erupts with memes when Donald Trump sits in 18-wheeler
text:
15 AM 
It’s rigged. 
While Republicans were trying to find a way to get their heath care plan to pass the House of Representatives,   was doing his best impression of a five-year-old driving Dad’s truck. 
Trump hopped in an 18-wheeler Thursday when he met with truck drivers and CEOs from the auto industry . The President was photographed behind the wheel, pulling the horn and even pretending to have road rage. 
Because sometimes it’s too easy, the internet couldn’t help but make fun of the commander-in-chief with a series of memes. 
Here’s a look at some of the best out there. ok what punk band wants to claim this as an album cover? pic.twitter.com/NNAW2lqeJM
